name: Feathers (fdarre)
description:
Feathers has been developped as part of the GameDevTV GameJam 2022.

The player is dead and the purpose of the game is to assemble a pair of wings to be able to reach the afterlife by collecting 10 feathers throughout 3 levels.

The player can shoot a star to make ghosts disappear (after 3 hits) and jump to avoid traps.

The player will turn into a ghost after being hurt 3 times.

List of supported input devices and controls :

- Video game controllers 
Xbox Gamepad has been tested. Other controllers should work as well.

Jump : South button (A on XBox controller)
Move : Left stick
Shoot : Right trigger

- Qwerty Keyboards
Jump : Space key
Move Backward : A key
Move Forward : D key
Shoot : Control key

- Azerty Keyboards
Jump : Space key
Move Backward : Q key
Move Forward : D key
Shoot : Control key

If the « Jump » key is held, the lenght of the jump will be longer.
